SELECT m.month AS month, COALESCE(SUM(raw.amount), 0) AS total_amount FROM (
) AS m LEFT JOIN (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(COALESCE(p.purchased_at, p.created_at), '%Y-%m') AS month, p.amount AS amount FROM payments p JOIN orders o ON p.order_no = o.no JOIN reservations r ON o.no = r.order_no JOIN weekly_time_slots w ON r.slot_no = w.no WHERE w.user_no = #{lawyerNo} AND p.status = 'DONE' AND o.status = 'PAID' AND o.order_type = 'RESERVATION' AND COALESCE(p.purchased_at, p.created_at) >= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 11 MONTH)
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(COALESCE(p2.purchased_at, p2.created_at), '%Y-%m') AS month, p2.amount AS amount FROM payments p2 JOIN orders o2 ON p2.order_no = o2.no JOIN tmpl_orders_history th ON o2.no = th.order_no JOIN template t ON th.tmpl_no = t.no WHERE t.user_no = #{lawyerNo} AND p2.status = 'DONE' AND o2.status = 'PAID' AND o2.order_type = 'TEMPLATE' AND COALESCE(p2.purchased_at, p2.created_at) >= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 11 MONTH) ) AS raw ON m.month = raw.month
GROUP BY m.month ORDER BY m.month
